I don't like that half the movie is on cd1 and half is on cd2.  makes it inconvenient to watch and really inconvenient to burn.

deeturtle - you can merge the two files together once downloaded by using something like Windows Movie Maker, although I use Xilisoft Video Converter personally & find it's perfect pretty much every time. You just merge them & choose to save as AVI, Mpeg4 or whatever you want the final merged file to be. Hope that helps!

I am definitely not new to this site but what I still don’t understand is the movies that are cut into 2 CDs. The file is cut and you have to go to the next one. Not everyone does this, as it is annoying to some people, and I can’t understand why it is done this why. It should only be 1 file for the movie. I am not complaining or bitching, I even rated this as a good quality download, I just don’t understand this method.

To those bitching and whining. It's cut in half for those who want to burn it. The movie is over 2 hours long. Though not by much, it might still be able to be burned onto 1 disc.

To catpurinn-

There is no way that this movie is too long to fit on one disc- that stopped being a problem with dvd burners. It was only putting movies on cds that would have required this movies to be on one disc. I can easily put 4 ish hours on one dvd without losing any quality.
